extendedIngredients.name: grainy mustard
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 Tablespoon Grainy Mustard (I used Grey Poupon)

extendedIngredients.name: havarti cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 Lb. Sliced Havarti Cheese (or whatever type you like…Swiss cheese is yummy too)
metaInformation: (or whatever type you like…Swiss cheese is yummy too)

extendedIngredients.name: low sodium beef broth
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 (16 Oz.) Can Of Low Sodium Beef Broth

extendedIngredients.name: deli ham
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 Lbs. Pastrami from the deli department (ask for it to be thinly sliced but not shaved)
metaInformation: for it to be  but not )

recipes.title: Crock-Pot Warm Pastrami Sandwiches
recipes.instructions: Add the sliced pastrami, beef broth and tablespoon of grainy mustard to a crock-pot (4-7 quart will work great).Cover and cook on low for 2-4 hours.Don’t cook longer than 4 hours or your pastrami will get tough…remember this meat is already fully cooked)Make sandwiches from pastrami, cheese and bread adding more mustard or whatever condiments you like on your sandwich.

steps.step: Add the sliced pastrami, beef broth and tablespoon of grainy mustard to a crock-pot (4-7 quart will work great).Cover and cook on low for 2-4 hours.Don’t cook longer than 4 hours or your pastrami will get tough…remember this meat is already fully cooked)Make sandwiches from pastrami, cheese and bread adding more mustard or whatever condiments you like on your sandwich.
